Request.RequestTemplate: <DataSet Name="AccountSync.ChangeCounterProfile" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <Attributes> <Attribute Name="Protocol" Type="System.String" Value="Wcf"/> <Attribute Name="Procedure" Type="System.String" Value="AccountSync.ChangeCounterProfile"/> <Attribute Name="ClientId" Type="System.String" Value="SPA"/> <Attribute Name="RequestId" Type="System.String" Value="##org.id##"/> <Attribute Name="FinPlatformVersion" Type="System.String" Value="[COUNTER_VER]"/> </Attributes> <DataTable Name="Data"> <Columns> <Column Name="SERVICE_CODE" Type="System.String"/> <Column Name="REINIT_TYPE" Type="System.String"/> <Column Name="TERMINAL_DEVICE_ID" Type="System.String"/> <Column Name="CHARGING_DATE_TIME" Type="System.String"/> <Column Name="CHANGE_DATE_TIME" Type="System.String"/> <Column Name="SUM_TYPE" Type="System.String"/> <Column Name="ADMIN_LIMIT" Type="System.String"/> </Columns> <Rows> ##Services## </Rows> </DataTable> </DataSet>
